meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Liz Rapelye Todd Grabarsky Andrew Haringer Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7072.

td.p: Liz Rapelye, a mother and writer from South Plainsfield, New Jersey
Todd Grabarsky, a lawyer from Los Angeles, California
Andrew Haringer, a college instructor from Squamish, British Columbia, Canada (whose 3-day cash winnings total $45,999)

tr.td: THE NATO PHONETIC ALPHABET
CHARLIE
OSCAR
WHISKEY
SIERRA
COWS

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '[The end-of-round signal sounds.]

the Berlin Wall

Andrew
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'A small museum devoted to the history of this barrier is located at Checkpoint Charlie on Friedrichstrasse')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: A small museum devoted to the history of this barrier is located at Checkpoint Charlie on Friedrichstrasse

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Andrew
Todd
Liz
A VISIT TO SLEEPY HOLLOW
IT'S A "CUR"IOUS THING
FRENCH HISTORY
ENTERTAINMENT ADVERBS
LITERARY CAST OF CHARACTERS
ETERNAL DAN NATION
(Alex: You have to identify the current country of the Daniel referred to in the clue.)

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
